exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rbar_opp_glb_lub (Rbar_glb (fun x : Rbar => _ (Rbar_opp x))) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H : forall E : Rbar -> Prop, Rbar_glb (fun x : Rbar => E (Rbar_opp x)) = Rbar_opp (Rbar_lub E) u : nat -> Rbar x : Rbar i : is_sup_seq u x r : R H0 : forall eps : posreal, exists n : nat, Rbar_lt match u n with | Finite x => - x | p_infty => m_infty | m_infty => p_infty end (r + eps) H1 : forall (eps : posreal) (n : nat), match match u n with | Finite x => Finite (- x) | p_infty => m_infty | m_infty => p_infty end with | Finite y => r - eps < y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end Unable to unify "(is_sup_seq (fun n : nat => Rbar_opp (?M2925 n)) (Rbar_opp ?M2926) -> is_inf_seq ?M2925 ?M2926) /\\ (is_inf_seq ?M2925 ?M2926 -> is_sup_seq (fun n : nat => Rbar_opp (?M2925 n)) (Rbar_opp ?M2926))" with "x = - r".

original: unfold Sup_seq, Inf_seq, Rbar_opp. rewrite Rbar_opp_glb_lub. apply is_sup_opp_inf_seq.
